mapper.sql:
FROM ROLE a where 1=1
and a.NAME = #{param.name}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM ROLE a, USER_ROLE b WHERE a.ID = b.ROLE_ID AND b.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT a.* FROM ROLE a WHERE a.ID=#{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT a.* order by a.CREATE_TIME desc limit #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROLE (ID, NAME, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, REMARKS) VALUES ( #{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from ROLE a where a.id = #{param.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
